sense.def:
Če nekaj storiš
of your own accord
, tisto storiš po svoji volji, ker tako želiš.

seg.quote: She knew they would leave of their own accord.

sense.def:
To be in accord
pomeni, da se ljudje o nečem strinjajo.

seg.quote: There are few issues on which the two are in perfect accord.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
and
OBJ
or
PREP
‘to’

sense.def:
To accord someone a particular kind of treatment
pomeni, da s tistim človekom ravnamo na določen način.

seg.quote: Newsmen accorded her the kind of coverage normally reserved for film stars.
They are given more importance than we would accord to them if left to ourselves.
